DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics immunogenicity single escalate dos PF-06342674 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess The Safety Of PF-06342674 In Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male subject female nonchildbearing potential subject age 18 55 . BMI 18.5 32 kg/m2 . Total body weight ≥40 kg ≤120 kg . Previous treatment antibody within 6 month prior Day 1 . Pregnant nursing female ; female childbearing potential . History sensitivity heparin heparininduced thrombocytopenia .
